data.text:
This article is currently under construction

This article is not finished and its author is currently working to improve it.

Rowan Luke Hughes (b. 9 January, 1977) was a half-blood wizard who attended Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He was sorted into the house of Slytherin. After his education at Hogwarts, Rowan worked for Gringotts Wizarding Bank as a Curse-Breaker.

Biography[]

Physical appearance[]

Rowan was a tall man, with a thin and lanky build. He had sable skin and statue-esque features. His hair was a dark brown - nearly black - in color and his eyes were dark brown as well.

Personality and traits[]

Magical abilities and skills[]

Possessions[]

Wand: Rowan's personal wand measured 10" in length and was made of poplar wood. The core of the wand was unicorn hair. The wand was described as "nice and supple."

Relationships[]

Amelia Martin[]

Simon Grey[]

Rowan first met Simon aboard the Hogwarts Express on 1 September 1988.

Sanjay Anwar[]

Like Simon, Rowan first met Sanjay aboard the Hogwarts Express on 1 September 1988.

Etymology[]

Rowan is a name of Irish origin and can be either a given name or a surname. It is eponymous with the rowan tree. Luke is a masculine given name, the English variant of the name Lucas, which is turn derived from the Latin name "Lucius". It means "light." Hughes is an Irish and Welsh surname of French origin. It is a patronymic surname, meaning "son of Hugh."

Behind the scenes[]
